name: Blender Express HD
summary: Choose from gorgeous retina display themes, where you’ll have to catch falling fruit with your specialized blender to create the perfect smoothie. Watch out for the rotten/poisoned fruit! Blender express offers hours of addictive gameplay through 100 different levels ( and more coming soon ! ) to keep the whole family fully entertained and satisfied. Catch the right fruit, earn 3 stars and bring the fun into your home kitchen with a real life recipe at your fingertips.
